game.name: Asphalt Legends
game.title: Asphalt 9: Legends
game.platform: Android | iOS | Windows | Steam | Nintendo Switch | Xbox One | Xbox Series X/S | macOS

about.short: Asphalt 9: Legends is a high-speed arcade racing game with licensed hypercars, cinematic tracks, and the TouchDrive control system.
about.full: Asphalt 9: Legends delivers console-quality graphics, an extensive selection of licensed supercars and hypercars, and fast-paced arcade racing. Players race on global tracks, perform aerial stunts, and compete in events, career mode, and online multiplayer. TouchDrive provides an assisted driving option for strategic route choice, while manual controls allow full precision. The game supports cross-play and cross-save across several platforms, and continues to receive seasonal updates, new cars, and live events.

tips: Use TouchDrive for smart route choices and consistent racing.

Upgrade cars starting from your most competitive class.
Use nitro shockwave to gain maximum acceleration.
Participate in limited-time events to unlock rare cars.
Improve graphics settings based on your device for smoother racing.
updates: New events and car releases frequently.
Club features expanded with new reward paths.
